EmailTemplate.name: Legend Boat Sale Experience
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the Legend Family {!Account.FirstName}!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.FirstName},
I would like to take the time to say how nice it was getting to know you and to thank you for your recent purchase here at Legend Boats. We are so grateful you chose us to start this boating journey!
Our mission as a company is to help our customers create memories through giving them the ultimate boat owning experience. In order to continue to do this, we would love your feedback on your most recent purchasing experience with us. Please take a couple of minutes to fill in this quick survey to let us know about your journey so far.
We can't wait to hear from you! If you have anymore questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me anytime.
Thanks again
{!Opportunity.Manager_Name__c}
